input_args.passage: "the Taliban | the Taliban, The battle took place between November 25 and December 1, 2001, in northern Afghanistan. input_args.claim: 'Then, from source, we can see that the battle was fought due to the intervention by United States-led coalition forces to overthrow the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which was harboring al-Qaeda operatives.'
